tableStructures.sheets: `sheetID` Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `editable` boolean, `name` text, `start` date, `end` date
tableStructures.tasks: `taskID` Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `sheetID` Integer, `name` text, `description` text, `maxPoints` float
tableStructures.submissions: `submissionID` Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `taskID` Integer, `identifier` text, `points` text
tableStructures.files: `fileID` Integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `submissionID` Integer, `sha` text, `filename` text
